ThingDef.label: Advanced Networked Lung
ThingDef.description: An advanced networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic lungs, and it's significantly more efficient. The cost comes from the infrastructure required for it to function.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Networked Kidney
ThingDef.description: An advanced networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic kidneys, and it's significantly more efficient. The cost comes from the infrastructure required for it to function.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Networked Liver
ThingDef.description: An advanced networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic livers, and it's significantly more efficient. The cost comes from the infrastructure required for it to function.
